results.name: a(n) = 7*a(n-1) - a(n-2) + 4, with a(0) = 0, a(1) = 5.
comment: The values (a(n),x(n)), n >= 2, x(n)=Fibonacci(2*n+2)*Fibonacci(2*n+3)=A081018(n+1), are the integer solutions (a,x) of the equation binomial(x+1,a+1) + binomial(x+2,a+1) = binomial(x+3,a+1). - Klaus Strassburger (strass(AT)ddfi.uni-duesseldorf.de)
The values (a(n),x(n)), n >= 2 are also the integer solutions (a, x) of the equation x(a+1) = (x-a)(x-a-1) or, equivalently, binomial(x, a) = binomial(x-1, a+1). - _Tomohiro Yamada_, May 30 2018
reference: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).

formula: a(n) = 8*a(n-1) - 8*a(n-2) + a(n-3). - _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_ and _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jan 22 2012
a(n) = -A206351(-n) for all n in Z. - _Michael Somos_, Jun 26 2018
